kkk.command.use_help: Click the corresponding value to configure, or use the command /kkk <function> <option> to set

kkk.command.highlightEntity.list_is_empt: <KKK> There are currently no highlighted entities
kkk.settings.usingItemSlowDownDisabled.d: Disable the slow effect when using items
kkk.settings.sneakingSlowDownDisabled.de: Disable the slow effect while sneaking
kkk.settings.hurtShakeDisabled.name: hurtShakeDisabled
kkk.settings.hurtShakeDisabled.desc: Disable the jitter of the first-person view when the player is injured
kkk.settings.renderHandDisabled.name: renderHandDisabled
kkk.settings.renderHandDisabled.desc: Disable the rendering of the arm
kkk.settings.bedRockFlying.name: bedRockFlying
kkk.settings.bedRockFlying.desc: Removed the drift effect while flying, just like Bedrock Edition
kkk.settings.blockOutlineColor.name: blockOutlineColor
kkk.settings.blockOutlineColor.desc: Modify the color of the block outline
kkk.settings.blockOutlineAlpha.name: blockOutlineAlpha
kkk.settings.blockOutlineAlpha.desc: Modify the alpha of the block outline
kkk.settings.skyColor.name: skyColor
kkk.settings.skyColor.desc: Modify the color of the sky
kkk.settings.fogColor.name: fogColor
kkk.settings.fogColor.desc: Modify the color of the fog
kkk.settings.waterColor.name: waterColor
kkk.settings.waterColor.desc: Modify the color of the water
kkk.settings.waterFogColor.name: waterFogColor
kkk.settings.waterFogColor.desc: Modify the color of the water fog
kkk.settings.quickKickFakePlayer.name: quickKickFakePlayer
kkk.settings.quickKickFakePlayer.desc: Use the hotkeys to kick out the fake player pointed to by the crosshair
kkk.settings.quickKickFakePlayer.extra.0: Specify hotkeys in the game settings
kkk.settings.quickDropFakePlayerAllItemS: Use hotkeys to throw out all item stacks of the fake player pointed by the crosshair
Specify hotkeys in the game settings
kkk.settings.letFluidInteractLikeAir.des: Let the player interact with the fluid like air
kkk.settings.fluidPushDisabled.name: fluidPushDisabled
Prevents the player from slowing and bouncing from slime blocks
kkk.settings.cobwebSlowDownDisabled.name: cobwebSlowDownDisabled
kkk.settings.cobwebSlowDownDisabled.desc: Prevents the player from being slowed by cobwebs
kkk.settings.iceSlipperinessDisabled.des: Prevents the player from slipping from ice blocks
kkk.settings.soulSandBlockSlowDownDisabl: Prevents the player from slowing from soul sands
Prevents the player from slowing and jumping falloff from honey blocks
kkk.settings.bubbleColumnInteractDisable: Prevents the player from being affected by the bubble column
kkk.settings.pickFluidBucketItemInCreati: In Creative mode, you can target a fluid and use the middle mouse button to pick up the corresponding bucket
kkk.settings.commandHighLightEntities.de: Use command to highlight one or more specified entities
kkk.settings.commandHighLightEntities.ex: Use /highlightEntity help command to view the user guide
